responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy Power BI dashboards, reports, and data models to address diverse client needs.
Connect and transform data from Dataverse and other sources for use in Power BI.
Collaborate with teams and mentor junior developers in Power BI best practices.
Engage with stakeholders to gather requirements and present findings.
Optimize performance and usability of Power BI reports.
Support troubleshooting, debugging, and maintenance of Power BI solutions.
Document processes, provide training to end users, and create knowledge-sharing resources.
skills: Proficient in Power BI, including data modeling, DAX, and dashboard creation.
Experience working with Dataverse as a data source.
Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Experience with Power Platform tools like Power Apps and Power Automate.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills focus primarily on the use of Power BI for designing, developing, and deploying dashboards, reports, and data models. The tasks involve connecting and transforming data, optimizing performance, and mentoring others in Power BI best practices. The skills required include proficiency in Power BI, experience with Dataverse, and familiarity with Power Platform tools like Power Apps and Power Automate. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on data visualization and business intelligence using Power BI and related tools.
